titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Major League Baseball officials should select Monterrey, Mexico, to host 25 percent of the total number of Montreal Expos games in the 2004 season as a gesture of goodwill between the United States and Mexico.

Expressing the sense of Congress that Major League Baseball officials should select Monterrey, Mexico, to host 25 percent of the total number of Montreal Expos games in the 2004 season as a gesture of goodwill between the United States and Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: "If You Build It They Will Come" Baseball Friendship Resolution - Expresses the sense of Congress that Major League Baseball officials should select Monterrey, Mexico, to host 25 percent of the total number of the Montreal Expos' home games in the 2004 season as a show of goodwill between the United States and Mexico.
